description:
Enhance your shopping experience with Alphamega from the palm of your hand.

At Alphamega Hypermarkets we care about our customers and we want them to enjoy all the benefits our Loyalty Card has to offer. Therefore, we created the "Alphamega Mobile App".

Download our new app, sign in with your credentials or register for a new account and start taking advantage of more rewards with your shopping!
-              Easily redeem your loyalty points
-              Find exclusive 'Just for You' offers
-              Benefit from our exclusive Partnerships
-              Find all leaflet offers sorted by department categories
-              Create your shopping list
-              View your transaction history
-              Find plenty of Recipes

Enjoy your favorite restaurants and stores, all in one place.
The Wolt app makes it easy to discover and order (almost) anything from your city. From delicious food and fresh groceries to pharmacy and pet supplies. Search by category, cuisine, restaurant or item! You can easily browse popular restaurants including McDonald's, KFC, Domino's, Pizza Hut, Papa Johns, Burger King and many more. Enjoy food delivery of burgers, pizza, sushi and other delicious items. If you prefer, you can pick up your order from the restaurant or store!

Order (almost) anything, on-demand.
Need to stock up on groceries? Can’t make it to the city? Wolt has you covered with groceries and essentials at your fingertips. Browse through the categories on Wolt and order anything, from pharmacy items to pet supplies. Anything you need, we’ve got you covered with our 40 000+ restaurants and stores. 

Top offers, only on Wolt.
Discover great offers on food, groceries and more! Browse hand-picked deals in the Wolt app and enjoy great savings. There’s offers on everything from food and groceries to electronics and homewares. Find the freshest deals in the app, including up to 50% off your order and €0 delivery fees!


Subscribe to Wolt+
If you’re looking for even bigger savings, Wolt+ is our popular subscription service offering €0 delivery fees, plus much more. As a Wolt+ member, you’ll unlock unbeatable deals and exclusive perks.

Make every occasion special with Wolt
We’ve made it easy to order and enjoy whatever you need. Get gifts for your loved ones, schedule orders for groceries and food, and save with deals on clothing and more! Wolt has you covered with everything to make moments special. Browse the selection of lovely flowers, chocolates, baked treats and more – delivered to your door in one hour or less.

Double Order
Need to order groceries and dinner? Now you can! Combine two local venues in one order with the same delivery fee. Place a Double Order and enjoy more convenience, for less!

Track every step
With every order, you can enjoy real-time tracking, and a minute-by-minute countdown. Whether you keep an eye on the tracker, or have other things to do, we'll keep you notified, so you know when your order is about to arrive.

Customer support
If something doesn’t go as planned, we’re ready to help – with customer support available 24/7. Our friendly team is there to help the 25+ countries we operate in and are ready to respond in seconds.

Payment
We think ordering Wolt should be as simple as possible. That’s why you can pay conveniently and securely with your credit card or Apple Pay. Whatever works for you.

Life simplified. Joy delivered. 
Wolt is currently available in 170+ cities located in Azerbaijan, Croatia, Cyprus, Czechia, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, Georgia, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Israel, Japan, Kazakhstan, Latvia, Lithuania, Malta, Norway, Poland,  Serbia,  Slovakia, Slovenia, Sweden. More are added all the time! Download Now and Unlock Essentials at your fingertips.

Wolt is an Editors’ Choice! 
Recognized by Apple as a top-rated app, Wolt delivers more than just food. Enjoy a seamless experience, from browsing our curated selection of restaurants to tracking your order in real-time.

Craving something delicious? Whether it's pizza, tacos, or your favourite fast food from Burger King and KFC, Bolt Food delivers straight to your door.

WHY CHOOSE BOLT FOOD?
- Real-time tracking: track your order and courier’s location from the restaurant to your doorstep.
- Convenient scheduling: plan ahead and order food or groceries in advance.
- Pickup options: prefer to grab your meal yourself? Use our pickup feature for easy collections.
- Takeaway deals and discounts: save on your favourite meals and snacks.
- Seamless payments: pay effortlessly using Google Pay, Apple Pay, or credit/debit cards.

HOW TO GET STARTED:
1. Set your delivery address.
2. Browse and pick meals, groceries, or snacks from your favourite local restaurants or stores.
3. Place your food order and pay securely.
4. Track your order in real-time.
5. Sit back and enjoy!

DISCOVER LOCAL AND GLOBAL FAVOURITES:
Explore a culinary world at your fingertips with Bolt Food. From beloved local restaurants to renowned fast food chains like McDonald's, get meals from your favourite restaurants delivered to your door.

*BOLT MARKET - QUICK GROCERY DELIVERY:
Need groceries or essentials delivered? Bolt Market brings everyday items like milk, bread, and coffee, as well as speciality products like pet supplies, cosmetics, or alcohol, right to your doorstep. Forget the long supermarket queues and shop smarter with Bolt Market.

*BOLT PLUS
With Bolt Plus, you can access exclusive benefits that save you time and money. For example, you can enjoy priority delivery for your orders, even during the busiest hours.

*GO OUT AND SAVE WITH DINEOUT
As convenient as it is to get food delivered to your door, some moments are worth making the trip out for. Find tables at nearby DineOut restaurants and get a discount off your meal. Just open the app, search for what you crave, and switch to the DineOut tab for in-restaurant offers. 

Bolt Food was created by the European super-app Bolt. It’s challenging the efficiency of the food and grocery delivery industry while helping restaurants and stores get more orders and enabling couriers to earn money.

Become a Bolt Food Courier partner:
Have a car, bike, or motorbike? Earn money delivering meals with Bolt Food: https://bolt.eu/en/food/courier/.

Partner with Bolt Food:
Are you a restaurant or grocery store? Boost your sales by joining Bolt Food: https://bolt.eu/en/food/partner/.

Get in touch with us via food@bolt.eu

Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/boltfood.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
*Only available in selected markets.

Foody is the easiest way for online delivery and take-away from 2100+ stores, in all the cities of Cyprus!

You can find exclusive offers, online payment option, multiple stores categories and a group order feature.

Download the app and order now!

Welcome to the new official McDonald’s app.

The app is filled with great offers specially tailored to you. Deals and discounts appear regularly so check back often to see what’s new.

The news section keeps you up to date with everything that’s going on in McDonald’s near you. Look here for new games and competitions.

The nutrition section provides information on our entire menu. We provide allergy advice and nutritional information on everything from the Big Mac to a single dip!

Use our restaurant finder to find your nearest McDonald’s. Filter your search based on opening hours, facilities and get directions from wherever you are.
Join the reward scheme of Zorbas Bakeries and enjoy unique benefits!

developer: OFD Online Food Delivery Services Ltd.
description:
efood - delivery in Greece

efood is the #1 online delivery platform in Greece and for good reason. It has so much to offer. We’ve brought together food, coffee, supermarkets, local neighborhood shops, offers, rewards, and so much more – all in one place! 

Whatever you want, whenever you want it, it’s just a few taps away!

• Coffee & food
You haven't cooked and you're hungry. We’ve been there. You woke up, and there's no way you’re getting up without a coffee. We get it. You always study late at night, but a chocolate-banana-cookie crepe could take your productivity to the next level. We totally understand. So, how can we help?
 - Quick order: Through “Order again”, easily find and repeat your previous orders.
 - Special selections: With Chef Leonidas Koutsopoulos, we created the Red Selection – a curated list of restaurants offering something special. We suggest taking a look. Or two. 

• Supermarket
Why go to the supermarket, when the supermarket can come to you? Forget the heavy bags, the checkout lines, and wandering through endless aisles.

Tap on the relevant category on efood and check out efood market — efood’s very own supermarket. Discover your favorite supermarket chains (SKLAVENITIS, AB, My market, Kritikos, BAZAAR, Carrefour and more) and choose whatever you want, at the same prices as in-store.

 - You choose the delivery time: Place your order and pick the day and time that works best for you. Yep, there are supermarkets open on efood, daily, even on Sundays.

 - Don’t miss the deals: Take a look at our awesome prices. 

• Want more? We’ve got you covered!
If you think that we would stop at food, coffee, and supermarkets, think again - we have more! Discover flower shops, liquor stores, pharmacies, greengrocers, butcher shops, fish shops, delicatessens, bookstores, technology products, bio products, optical stores, fitness options, and pet shops. What else do you want? We can bring that too!

 - Forgot a birthday or anniversary? No worries - order flowers, books, or anything else you’d like, and surprise your loved ones with a gift!

- Deals & rewards
Our goal is to help you enjoy everything efood has to offer every single day. Discover how you can make the most of it.

- Become a pro | Free unlimited delivery and 10% off on selected stores.

- Collect rubies, earn coupons | Each order from the same store gets you closer to a coupon for your next one.

- Are you a student? Get ready to eat well! | If you have a student pass, discover unique deals exclusively for you.

Add. Cart. Send.

Τhink it's difficult? Not at all. Trust us! 
 - Step 1: Choose your location
 - Step 2: Pick the store you want
 - Step 3: Add products to your cart
 - Step 4: Cash? Card? Apple Pay? Google Pay? Ticket Restaurant? It’s up to you!
 - Step 5: Send your order

That’s it!

Something went wrong? Check out our FAQ section, or chat with one of our agents.

Available in 100+ cities across Greece
Download the efood app and enjoy anything you want, whenever you want.

Get food delivery to your doorstep from thousands of amazing local and national restaurants. Find the meal you crave and order food from restaurants easily with the Uber Eats app. Track your order in real-time.

FIND YOUR FAVOURITE FOOD & RESTAURANTS
Order food from nearby restaurants and search by cuisine, restaurant name, dish, and meal. 
Food delivery options for you to order and enjoy such as pizza, burritos, burgers, sushi, fish and chips, doughnuts and Chinese takeout.
Prefer pickup? Skip the line and reservations and choose to pick up your order instead. Choose your favourite delivery options with the Uber Eats app now.

SUBSCRIBE TO UBER ONE
For £5.99 per month, Uber One subscribers enjoy £0 delivery fee and up to 5% off orders over £15 at participating non-grocery stores (and 5% off orders over £25 at participating grocery stores) available on Uber Eats. Members are also eligible for rewards, perks, coupons, and offers. View full Uber One Terms & Conditions in app.

ORDER ALMOST ANYTHING, ANYTIME
Order household needs from your favourite pharmacies, supermarkets, and pet shops. Baby food or nappies, pharmacy needs, beauty products and cosmetics. Grocery staples like bread and milk, bananas and produce, flowers and plants, packaged foods or frozen treats. 

You can even order alcoholic drinks including beer, wine, spirits and cocktails.*

SIMPLE DELIVERY ORDERING
Pick your food order from any menu and add it to your cart with a few taps. That’s it.
Uber Eats makes it easy to order food delivery online or through the app and have it delivered by restaurants and delivery people near you.
Or, schedule your order in advance for a delivery person to pick it up later. Your choice!

ORDER FOOD AHEAD WITH PICKUP
Now you can also order food ahead for Pickup instead of just ordering delivery. Select Pickup, add food items to your cart, and skip the lines to the restaurant to get your food.

REAL-TIME ORDER TRACKING
Track your food delivery order on a map as it heads your way.
See the estimated arrival time at your address.
Get notified when your order arrives.

FIND SOME OF YOUR FAVOURITE NATIONAL RESTAURANTS
Some of our food delivery partners include: Pizza Hut, Domino’s Pizza, Burger King, Dunkin', KFC, McDonald's, Starbucks, Subway, Taco Bell,Costa Coffee, Kaspas, Gourmet Burger Kitchen, Franco Manca, Dixy Chicken, Chipotle, Chaiiwala, Amigos Burgers Shakes, Papa John’s, Krispy Kreme.  

FIND PHARMACIES, GROCERY STORES, AND MORE
Order from grocery stores such as Asda, Sainsbury Supermarket, Waitrose, The Co-op, Iceland, M&S Food, and Londis. You can also order from pharmacies such as Boots via Uber Eats, as well as from other delivery partners in the convenience and retail spaces.

ABOUT UBER EATS
Uber Eats is the way to order the food you love through an easy delivery experience. Uber Eats is available in hundreds of cities around the world. Enter your delivery address to explore restaurant and grocery delivery options near you.

AVAILABLE INTERNATIONALLY

Join others in your city who use the Uber Eats app to order from their favourite restaurants and schedule delivery.

Uber Eats is currently available in cities and metro areas including Adelaide, Amsterdam, Atlanta, Auckland, Austin, Baltimore, Brussels, Cape Town, Chicago, Dallas, Denver, Johannesburg, Glasgow, London, Los Angeles, Madrid, Melbourne, Mexico City, Miami, Milan, Nashville, New Orleans, New York, Ottawa, Paris, Philadelphia, San Diego, San Francisco, Seattle, Stockholm, Sydney, Taipei, Tokyo, Toronto, Warsaw, and Washington DC. Uber Eats helps you find food delivery around the world. Order delivery in countries around the world. See full list of available countries on our website. Uber content/messages human- or machine-translated as per device settings; accuracy not guaranteed

*Alcohol is only available in select markets. Must be at least 18 to purchase. Item availability varies by market. See the Uber Eats app for details.

Hungry? Get your favourite meals, takeaways and groceries delivered to your door in minutes with Deliveroo. From local gems to big-name brands, discover thousands of restaurants and supermarkets near you.

ALL YOUR FAVOURITES, DELIVERED:

- Restaurants: Big brands and local gems
- Grocery: Always fresh with our Freshness Promise
- Convenience: Beauty essentials, flowers, gifts, DIY and more in minutes

Order from the restaurants you’re craving...

- Sushi or pizza?
- A Chinese or Indian?
- Burgers, pasta, breakfast or something sweet?

All of your favourites are just a tap away from top brands like KFC, McDonald’s, Burger King, Subway, Nando’s, Wagamama, Popeyes, Papa John’s, Wingstop, Giggling Squid, Kokoro, Pizza Express, Five Guys, Franco Manca, Dishoom, Pho, Taco Bell, Starbucks, Gail's Bakery, Joe & the Juice, GBK and more!

Or Fancy something different? Discover thousands of local gems that deliver right to your door.

£0 DELIVERY FEE WITH DELIVEROO PLUS

Become a member and you’ll also unlock:

- Exclusive offers and member-only deals
- Monthly rewards that help your money go further
- Discounted service fees*
- Earn 10% back on restaurant orders over £30*

*Plus Gold members only

It’s the simplest way to save while enjoying what you love most.

SUPERMARKETS SORTED

Get groceries delivered fast from top supermarkets, including Waitrose, ASDA, Morrisons, M&S, Sainsbury’s, Co-Op, Amazon Fresh, Whole Foods, Spar, One Stop, Iceland and Majestic Wine.

MORE THAN FOOD

We’re here for the everyday essentials and little treats too. From Boots and Healf to Not On The High Street, B&Q, Screwfix, Accessorize and The Perfume Shop, we've got you covered.

WHY CHOOSE DELIVEROO?

- Track every order live from kitchen to doorstep
- Enjoy fast, reliable delivery when it matters
- Order for right now or schedule for later
- Pick up deals you won’t find anywhere else

Download the app today and let us bring the best of your neighbourhood straight to your door.

T&Cs apply. Visit the website for full details.

Discover the perfect blend of convenience and luxury with the Nespresso Middle East & Africa app – your go-to destination for all things coffee! Whether you're a coffee enthusiast, a professional barista, or someone who simply enjoys a great cup of coffee, this app brings the Nespresso Boutique experience right to your fingertips. Find the perfect coffee machine, from compact models to advanced designs, and complete your coffee corner with stylish accessories like capsule dispensers.
•  Stay Updated on the Latest Launches: Be the first to know about new Nespresso Limited Edition coffees and exclusive offers.
•  Easy Reordering & Fast Delivery: Reorder your favorite coffee capsules and accessories with just a swipe. Enjoy fast and convenient delivery solutions tailored to your location.

Why Nespresso?
Nespresso is synonymous with premium coffee, offering unparalleled quality and innovation. Whether you're looking for coffee capsules, coffee pods, or accessories, Nespresso provides an exceptional coffee experience.
Download the Nespresso Middle East & Africa App Today!
Transform your coffee routine with the Nespresso app – the ultimate coffee application for coffee lovers. From coffee accessories to premium coffee blends, everything you need is just a tap away.

**Availability and conditions of each service is subject to your country.

Do you love to order food online from your favourite restaurant? Use this app to keep in touch faster, easier and better with the restaurant you eat frequently from. If you are a loyal customer of one of our member-restaurants, this is the online food ordering app for you. 

Features:
- order online your food from your chosen restaurant(s)
- based on location, the app automatically displays the restaurant(s) you order from   
- you can see if restaurant is ready to take orders now and quickly browse their menu
- your contact details will be pre-filled so next time you order easier and faster
- your order confirmation includes pickup/delivery time estimation, provided by the restaurant staff especially for you and your order.
- your order will be confirmed in real time as member restaurants are directly handling your order immediately. 

No middle-man, no confusing call-center, no over-promises. This is just between you and your chosen restaurant.

The Official Thermomix® Cookidoo® App gives you access to the growing universe of mouth-watering Thermomix® Guided Cooking recipes. You pick and choose which recipes go with you wherever you are. Create an account and get cooking!


SMART @ HEART
Connect to Cookidoo® and access over 100,000 worldwide recipes directly from your app and through the screen of the Thermomix® TM6. Also, be sure to check out the exclusive step-by-step photos and videos, making cooking easier than ever.


YOUR THERMOMIX® COOKIDOO® ACCOUNT
To use the app, you need to have your Thermomix® Cookidoo® username and password. Your local Thermomix® Cookidoo® website will tell you how to create your account for the app.


GET INSPIRED
Wondering what to cook today? Discover hundreds of ideas for every taste, season and occasion! With Cookidoo® membership, you get instant access to every recipe on Cookidoo®. Everything’s on the menu! Our recipe suggestions and articles will point you in the right direction.
 
 
CREATED RECIPES
Discover our newest Cookidoo® feature! You can create, import and modify your favourite recipes, save them all in one place and cook them with your Thermomix®. Your Thermomix®, your way.


PLAN AND COOK
Planning is easy and fun, add recipes to your planner and find the recipes ready for cooking when you need them. The Cook Today button on each recipe lets you schedule a recipe with a single click.


MAKE IT YOUR OWN
Create your own recipe lists to manage your recipes the way you want. Bookmark any recipe you find appealing so you can find it later. You can also view recipes you scheduled in the past.
 
 
COOK-KEY® BRINGS GUIDED COOKING TO YOUR FINGER TIPS
Cook-Key® connects your Thermomix® TM5 to Cookidoo®. Enjoy sending your recipe favourites, weekly plan and recipe collections from the iOS App to your Thermomix®.


Terms of Use:
https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

As a foody partner you earn money by delivering orders to local customers! 

You choose your own schedule and earn per journey, whenever and wherever it suits you. 

Sound good?! All you need to do is sign up via the app and follow the simple steps to register. No previous experience is needed. 

What else?! We offer:
- Bonuses
- Refer a friend rewards
- Efficient order system - no more waiting for orders
- Easy scheduling
- Clear overview of hours and earnings

Download the app, become a partner, receive the activation bonus and start earning money immediately!

TheFork is Europe’s leading restaurant booking platform, proudly bringing people together through unique and affordable culinary experiences since 2007. What are you waiting for? Activate your location and we’ll activate your taste buds! You set the tone, we set the table.

TheFork continues to be savoured across the biggest foodie hotspots in France, Spain, Italy, the UK, the Netherlands, Belgium, Switzerland, Portugal, Denmark, and Sweden. But wait, what exactly do we bring to the table? Here are 6 reasons to download TheFork app right now.

1. Things that tickle our taste buds: fast, free and easy online booking
We know that normal life means having a lot on your plate, so to make things a bit easier for you, we've simplified restaurant booking. With a few simple taps on our mobile app, you’ll be one step closer to having that ‘mmm’ moment of pure belly satisfaction, in the most seamless way possible.

2. Frugal on prices, never on flavours
Our amazing restaurant partners love their diners as much as we love ours and offer exclusive discounts on reservations throughout the year (automatically applied and subject to conditions at the time of booking). That way restaurants get to open their doors to all types of diners, making dining out accessible to everyone.

3. Community insights = better bites
Tuck into the wisdom of our gourmet community! With over 20 million trusted reviews from only customers who have actually tried the restaurant—your palette is in good hands!

4. We don’t skimp on choice
Reserved? Not us. That’s just a label for a table. So whether you’re looking for the perfect spot for bottomless brunching, taco crunching or al-fresco munching, our foodies are spoiled for choice with our diverse collection of over 60,000 restaurants and 40,000 photos, menus and community reviews that will satisfy just about any culinary mood and occasion. After all, variety is the spice of life! Browse, scroll and add to favourites, so you can find more of what you love. Now that’s food for thought.

5. We take loyalty VERY seriously
To reward our awesome foodie community, every booking with TheFork accumulates unique Yums points, which can be redeemed in the form of a tasty discount at one of our many partner restaurants down the line. Here’s how it works:

1 reservation = 100 Yums (Y)

Once you've accumulated enough you can enjoy amazing offers which converts to: 
1000 Yums = £20 loyalty discount!
2000 Yums = £50 loyalty discount!

Keep an eye out for Double Yums and other ways to earn more Yums as you book.

We love hearing from our TheFork foodie community! Reach out at contact@thefork.com.

>In the UK, follow us on:
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TheFork.uk/
- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thefork_uk/?hl=en

MANAGE YOUR PLANS IN ONE PLACE

The official McDonald’s iPhone app!

Coupons, restaurants and your favorite products in a new design. Download our new app today:

- Current promotional products* and all our classics

Welcome to Eatr - the ultimate companion for everyone from cooking novices to seasoned chefs! 
Our app is designed to guide you through a culinary adventure tailored just for you. Whether you're pressed for time or looking to indulge in a leisurely cooking spree, Eatr has you covered.

Time Management in Your Kitchen:
Choose your cooking time - from quick 15-minute bites to sumptuous meals under an hour - and let Eatr plan your menu. Busy schedules have met their match with our smart, time-conscious recipes.

Get Inspired:
Dive into thousands of mouth-watering recipes. With Eatr, discover daily inspiration and never run out of ideas for your next meal.

Personalized Skills Journey:
Whether you’re just starting out or are a kitchen pro, Eatr grows with you. Select your skill level and get recipes that challenge and excite you, all the while expanding your culinary prowess.

Dietary Preferences? We Listen:
Keto? Vegan? Pescatarian? No matter your diet, Eatr offers personalized recommendations to keep you aligned with your lifestyle choices. Sticking to your diet was never this effortless or delightful.

Powerful Filters for Tailored Search:
With robust search filters for cuisine, diet, meal type, and more, find exactly what you fancy with just a few taps.


Ratings and Feedback:
Be part of a community where your opinion matters. Rate recipes, helping others and yourself to the best-tasting dishes.

Nutritional Insight:
Stay informed with detailed nutritional information for each recipe, ensuring you meet your health and fitness goals.



Easy Cooking with Step-by-Step Guides:
Clear, concise, and easy-to-follow instructions take the guesswork out of cooking. Enjoy the process as much as the result!

Terms of use: https://eatr.com/terms_of_service

Discover and book at thousands of the best restaurants across the Middle East with Eat App. Great for travellers or residents looking to find the perfect dining experience, we have the widest selection of bookable restaurants across the region. Filter and sort restaurants however you need and see menus, reviews and restaurant info. All your reservations are recorded and accessible in the app, and sharable with friends.

We also list thousands of individual restaurant experiences and promotions across the region so you know exactly what's happening in your city every night of the week.

Available in United Arab Emirates, Bahrain, Oman, Qatar, Jordan and the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, start finding your new favorite place to eat.

Discover - Search and filter and find a great restaurant across the region.

Book - Get a confirmed reservation from the restaurant anytime you want. No need to call.

Experiences - from brunch to special promos and one-off events, find somewhere new to experience tonight. 


Download Eat App for free today.

The Baby Plates mobile app is your reliable assistant in ensuring healthy and proper nutrition for your baby from the very beginning of weaning! We created this app to make the process of preparing and planning baby meals easy and enjoyable.

In the app, you will find:

Recipes
We have many recipes specifically designed for babies, considering their age needs and preferences. Each dish contains video instructions, description, cooking steps and time, as well as minimum age. You can filter dishes by desired category, main ingredient, age, presence of allergens and cooking time.


Meal Planner
Organize your baby's meals with our handy planner, which includes a variety of ready-made balanced plate solutions. Plan meals and snacks for days or weeks ahead based on your child's preferences in the "My Planner" section.


Shopping List
Create a shopping list so you don't forget anything. Add everything you need directly from recipes and meal plans, as well as manually.

Weaning Chart
Our app includes a detailed weaning chart that helps you track the introduction of new foods into your baby's diet. With it, you can monitor progress and know exactly which foods have already been introduced.

Serving Rules
Learn the serving rules to avoid possible risks and make your child's nutrition as safe and comfortable as possible.

Articles
In the "Getting Started" section, you will find useful articles about baby nutrition, the beginning of weaning, necessary purchases, portion sizes, first aid, and more.

Favorites
Save your favorite recipes and plates in Favorites for quick access at any time.

You can also share your prepared dishes and plates in the comments, ask any questions you have, and choose the color scheme you like the most!

Our app will become a reliable assistant in the world of baby nutrition, helping make the feeding process easier and more enjoyable for your baby and saving a significant amount of precious time for moms. Download now and start the journey to healthy and happy nutrition for your child!

Privacy Policy: https://babyplates.recipes/policy/
Terms of Use: https://babyplates.recipes/terms-of-use/

Save your details for next time
Order for later

Keep up-to-date with our special offers and promotions 
Search for Pizza Hut locations and view their services and menus.

Download the new Pizza Hut Cyprus app and your Hut favorites will always be at your fingertips, just a few quick taps away!

Try now our brand new Domino's Pizza moblie application! Enjoy ordering quickly in just a few taps and get discount up to 40%! 

How it works? 
* Choose to place order for Delivery or Collection from store 
* Pick any of your Domino's favorite products and customize just the way you like 
* Watch REAL-TIME the progress of you pizza while its being made on our Pizza Tracker 
* Enjoy your delicious order at home or by collecting from your nearest store! 

Technical Specifications: 
* Product Carousel - The most easy mechanism to navigate through your favorite products! 
* Available in Greek & English 
* Build your own pizza the way you want it! Select across a wide range of fresh doughs and delicious toppings 
* Find your nearest store and show the shortest route on how to get there 

Help us make a better app! Your feedback is extremely valuable to us! Please contact us with any ideas/bugs/fixes on: info@dominos.com.cy

Δοκίμασε φρέσκο, γευστικό φαγητό με πολύ μεγάλη έκπτωση και καταπολέμησε τη σπατάλη τροφίμων!

Βοήθησε το περιβάλλον και εξοικονόμησε χρήματα χρησιμοποιώντας την εφαρμογή μας για τη μείωση της σπατάλης τροφίμων στην Ελλάδα.

Με το Mystery Pot είναι εύκολο να βοηθήσεις το περιβάλλον μας. Μπορείς να ανακαλύψεις, να σώσεις και να απολαύσεις φρέσκα και νόστιμα τρόφιμα σε έκπτωση από τα αγαπημένα σας τοπικά καταστήματα, αρτοποιεία, ζαχαροπλαστεία, ψητοπωλεία, εστιατόρια και καφετέριες. 

Γνωρίζεις ότι το ένα τρίτο του συνόλου των τροφίμων που παράγονται δεν καταναλώνονται ποτέ και συνεπώς απορρίπτονται; Με την ένταξή σου στο κίνημά μας κατά της σπατάλης τροφίμων, μπορείς να κάνεις τη διαφορά, διασφαλίζοντας ότι τα καλά τρόφιμα πλέον  τρώγονται και δεν σπαταλούνται.

Η χρήση της εφαρμογής είναι είναι πολύ απλή, μονο 3 βήματα!

1. Κατέβασε την εφαρμογή και αναζήτησε νόστιμες επιλογές για γεύματα και σνακ, όπως πίτσα, σουβλάκια,  αρτοσκευάσματα, προϊόντα μαναβικής και άλλα από τα αγαπημένα σας μαγαζιά ή ανακάλυψε καινούργιες γεύσεις. 
2. Αγόρασε το "Mystery Pot" σου με τρόφιμα σε έκπτωση στο ένα τρίτο της αρχικής τιμής.

3. Παρέλαβε το Mystery Pot σου την ώρα παραλαβής που ορίζει το κατάστημα και απόλαυσε το γεύμα σου συμβάλλοντας στην προστασία του περιβάλλοντος.

Κατέβασε σήμερα την εφαρμογή του Mystery Pot για να βρεις τρόφιμα σε εξαιρετική τιμή και κάνε το πορτοφόλι σου και τον πλανήτη να χαμογελούν!

developer: Talabat General Trading and Contracting Company
description:
Hey! Looking for the quickest food delivery? That’s easy with our new talabat app.

Whether you want a pizza, burger or groceries, choose from thousands of markets and restaurants in your city and put your hunger to an end. We’ve got it all – fast delivery, unlimited options, easy online payment and vouchers all at your fingertips.

Order your favorite food and get it delivered to wherever you are, but also get your groceries delivered to you with more cities to come. Your needs, done - simply download our app, choose your food or groceries and pay in a few taps via card or cash upon delivery. 

Browse a multitude of restaurant menus and order from countless stores. With our filters and smart search functions, you can find the exact menu or product you want in no time, available to personalize at your request.

"Pay online or in cash"
Add info to your account on our new talabat app to speed up your order process. Pay in cash or save card details to pay online, reorder your favorites anytime and save addresses so you’re ready for delivery wherever you are. Like planning ahead? Pick what time you want us to deliver to avoid hunger kicking in.

"Track your order from start to finish"
That’s right; follow your delivery from the moment it’s confirmed to the second we hand it to you. With notifications, you'll always be updated and our help center will answer any questions about your delivery – we’ve got you.

"Find exclusive deals"
Downloading the talabat app makes you a part of our fam. We’re more than food delivery; discover vouchers, promotions and deals and treat yourself to that midweek pizza or Friday night burger more often. By opting in for notifications, we'll also share new restaurants, supermarkets and stores in your area, so you’ll never miss out on the latest offers again.

Find us in Kuwait, the United Arab Emirates, Bahrain, Oman, Qatar, Jordan, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and Egypt.

Happy ordering.

Ordering world famous fried chicken has never been easier! Download the new KFC Cyprus app to enjoy your favorite KFC meals and to access special deals.

Delivery
All your favorites delivered at your doorstep.

Take away 
Skip the lines and pick up freshly prepared food for take away from your nearest KFC restaurant.

Fast Checkout 
Quick, easy, and contactless.
